## Slider Interaction with Shinylive (Serverless)

This document runs Python in the browser using WebAssembly, requiring **no backend server** for deployment.


### Input Controls

::: {#b6697bc7 .cell server='' ui='sidebar' execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from shiny.ui import input_slider, h3
from shiny.express import ui
from shiny import render
from shiny.express import input

ui.h3("Adjust the slider:")
ui.input_slider("n", "Number of bins", 0, 100, 20)


@render.text
def txt():
    # This Python code runs in your browser
    return f"The current value is: {input.n()}"
```
:::
